TopicTitle: Is there a WORKING Lunokhod for .90 ??

Articles.Content: Bobcats version is not compatible from this place [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/81754-Release-BobCat-Ind-Space-Planet-products](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/81754-Release-BobCat-Ind-Space-Planet-products) . I think someone else made one cant quite remember who did it.

It was from Space-Factory, I think and last time, I tried it some parts was broke and you look for just the little lander it works. [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/47765-Space-Factory](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/47765-Space-Factory)

EDIT- Will install it again and see.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-24T03:08:53Z" title="03/24/2015 03:08  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 24, 2015</time> by Mecripp2**
tried the space factory one, failed

What's not working ? 

EDIT- space factory is just the lander not the little hod rover.

EDIT- And on the bobcat one someone changed some things. I think thought there was a deploy wheel base but it don't have it not and the wheels just spin and it don't move.

EDIT- OK fixed the wheels now got to fix the lander legs.

EDIT- OK think got it all patched up quick test run and see.

EDIT- All working but the lights.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-24T05:26:57Z" title="03/24/2015 05:26  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 24, 2015</time> by Mecripp2**
no fair....u are getting it past the game loading screen. it locks up for me when the TAC stuff loads

My mod has the patch config for it, so both Lunokhod and Luna 17 from corresponding mods worked correctly at 0.25. Still should work at 0.90, I believe.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-27T16:35:50Z" title="03/27/2015 04:35  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 27, 2015</time> by Dr. Jet**

> 
> My mod has the patch config for it, so both Lunokhod and Luna 17 from corresponding mods worked correctly at 0.25. Still should work at 0.90, I believe.

No it don't your patch moves the nodes for the wheels and stuff also and not sure if it's your mod or anther with it installed not all the parts where showing up.

EDIT- But Love your rover parts much thanks ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

EDIT- And have them working all but the lights on the Lunokhod

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-27T17:19:53Z" title="03/27/2015 05:19  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 27, 2015</time> by Mecripp2**

1) There no lights on Lunokhod rovers IRL. Those "eyes" are TV cameras.

2) Nodes were moved in patch to re-orient rover horisontally and make it fit with old Luna-17 model.

3) Due to model and/or config changes, nothing fits now as it should even after re-rescale, so further support will be removed. 

Thus there are no more working configs for Lunokhod missions at 0.90. 

P.S. Maybe one day I will catch an inspiration and draw stockalike Munokhod-1 + Muna-17. But that's very unlikely in short terms. Don't have time to even update properly.
